Development Journey

My professional journey and milestones in web development

Transitioning from IT Assistant to Main Career Path
2025 - Present
Self-EmployedBangkok

After leaving my IT Assistant role, I refocused on my primary career as a developer. I have been learning new tech stacks, practicing with real-world projects, and strengthening hands-on experience to build production-ready skills.

Key Achievements:

  • Learned and applied modern tech stacks such as Vite, TypeScript, Express, WebSocket, Prisma, TailwindCSS, Shadcn/UI, etc.
  • Practiced usage of key tools and libraries including Redux Toolkit, Framer Motion, Zod, React Hook Form, React Query, etc.
  • Explored AI-powered development tools, including AI-integrated IDEs and productivity extensions.
  • Developed real-world projects to gain production-level experience, such as a Social Media Application and a Restaurant Management System.
Starting a New Career as an IT Assistant in Bangkok
2024 - 2025
JM505 Computer Sales & ServiceBangkok

When conflict escalated across the country, I relocated to Bangkok. As a junior, securing a permanent web development role was challenging, so I began a new career path as an IT Assistant.

Key Achievements:

  • Relocated to Bangkok
  • Responsible for sales, software and hardware maintenance, repairs, packaging, and product delivery
  • Improved customer engagement by 25%
  • Digitized product information and improved quality control with real-time updates
  • Optimized product information system and improved response time to customers by 50%
Relocating to Yangon to Begin My Career as a Developer
2023 - 2024
Promes MMYangon

Began my professional development career by contributing to scalable web applications using React, TypeScript, and Node.js. Supported project development and gained hands-on industry experience.

Key Achievements:

  • Relocated to Yangon
  • Started career as a Junior Frontend Developer at Promes MM Company
  • Contributed to projects such as Healthcare System, Billing Management, and Real Estate applications
  • Maintained and improved legacy frontend projects, and helped build new projects using React, React Admin, Bootstrap, and related packages
Supporting Family Business During Fire Hazards and Regional Conflict
2022 - 2023
Family BusinessShwebo

After the military takeover and rising regional conflict, our family business was impacted by instability and fire hazards. I focused on helping sustain operations during this difficult period.

Key Achievements:

  • Helped stabilize and maintain family business operations until regional conflict subsided

Professional Web Developer Course
2019 - 2020
Fairway TechnologyYangon

When universities shut down due to COVID-19, I relocated to Yangon to focus on web development and enrolled in a professional web development course at a well-known private institute.

Key Achievements:

  • Relocated to Yangon
  • Gained practical knowledge in real-world web development
  • Learned industry-relevant tech stack including HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, JWT, and MongoDB, and practiced building projects with these technologies
  • Attended English classes to improve speaking and listening skills
Computer Science Degree
2015 - 2019
University of Computer StudiesMonywa

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a focus on software engineering and web technologies.

Key Achievements:

  • Gained foundational knowledge of web development languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Studied various programming languages including OOP, C++, C#, and Java.
  • Acquired knowledge in Database Management Systems, Networking, and Software Engineering.
  • Completed A+ certification covering practical computer installation, repair, and maintenance.
